text:
Pharita hampir aja oleng gara-gara di dorong ke samping sama Karina, tuh cewek barbar benar-benar terniat nyamperin mobil Pharita. Tapi nyatanya gak segampang itu.
Pharita langsung narik lengan Karina dan dorong badannya pake dua tangan.
"Mending lo semua pergi! Gue mau balik!" ucap Pharita
Tapi tanpa disangka-sangka, Karina yang mulai kesel akhirnya mendorong badan Pharita cukup kuat, sampai Pharita nubruk depan mobilnya. Pharita mendongak, natap ke empat adeknya yang keliatan banget panik.
Pharita sempet ngasih senyum tipis sebelum balik badan ke arah Karina cs.
"Cih! Dasar lemah! Sok-sokan lo mau lawan gue hah?!"
Karina dengan gilanya nyekek leher mulus Pharita. Gerakannya terlalu cepet, Pharita sama sekali gak bisa ngelak. Dia cuma bisa nahan tangan Karina, berusaha melepas cekikikannya.
"A-aakhh!!"
Sumpah Pharita rasanya hampir kehabisan stok oksigen karena ulah Karina. Sementara Asa, Rami, Ahyeon, Rora udah histeris gak karuan di dalem mobil.
trans:
Pharita was almost falling because Karina pushed her down, that badass girl was that much intended to come over to Pharita's car but it was not that easy.
Pharita pulled Karina's house and pushed her body with her two hands.
"You're all better go! I wanna go home!" said Pharita.
Unexpectedly, Karina began upset and pushed Pharita's body strong enough, and bumped her car. Pharita looked up, staring at her four sisters, they looked panicked.
Pharita smiled a little before turning her body to face Karina and her friends.
"Tch! Weak girl! How dare you fight against me, huh?!"
Karina strangled Pharita's smooth neck crazily. Her move was too fast, Pharita couldn't avoid her at all. She only could hold Karina's hand, trying to let her wriggle.
"A-aargh!!"
Pharita felt losing her oxygen because of what Karina did. Meanwhile, Asa, Rami, Ahyeon, and Rora scream hysterically inside the car.
